Summary: Ambitious, results-driven full stack (MERN) web developer with proven success creating visually alluring, intuitive, and functional designs. Forward-thinking innovator with the ability to “see around corners,” continuously creating and improving to keep projects on track. Dynamic and approachable relationship builder with innate ability to develop instantaneous rapport with clients, employees/colleagues, leadership, and team. Inspiring leader who fosters collaboration and is most energized when creating to reach for success.

Member of founding management team of a boutique ceramic manufacturing company specializing in small production runs, custom orders, mold and model making. Oversee daily operations and production goals with intent focus on consistent improvement opportunities.

Oversaw P&L and targeted financial profitability; recruitment, development and ongoing morale of staff; marketing, sales and branding direction; membership experiences and client expectations; and community engagement.

Focal Projects.Name: Trading Grounds
Focal Projects.Overview: An educational application that simulates the stock market using current real time stock prices, allowing users to gain experience in buying, selling, and tracking a portfolio. This app also allows the users to experience the highs and lows of the stock market and gain experience while not risking the loss of actual capital.
Focal Projects.Tech Stack: HTML5 | CSS3 | Handlebars.js | MySQL Workbench | Materialize CSS Library

Focal Projects.Name: Clicky Game
Focal Projects.Overview: A Memory Game application built with React.js and themed on 1980’s Movie Soundtracks.
Focal Projects.Tech Stack: React.js | HTML5 | CSS3 | JavaScript/JSX | ES6 | Bootstrap CSS Library

Focal Projects.Name: New York Times Search Engine
Focal Projects.Overview: This is a React-based article search application for the New York Times. It utilizes the React mounting lifecycle to query and display articles based on three criteria: search topic, start date and end date.
Focal Projects.Tech Stack: React.js | HTML5 | CSS3 | JSX | ES6 | Bootstrap CSS Library
